授業目的: The purpose of the course is to introduce the basic probability and statistical concepts/tools necessary to analyze and improve the quality of the quantitative decision making process for business problems. Students will learn the basic computer techniques to implement these technical concepts by integrating the relevant computer skills with examples that enhance the understanding of Business & Economic Statistics.
到達目標:
After completing this course, students will be able to:
1. Understand basic computer skills to implement statistical techniques.
2. Integrate relevant computer skills with examples related to Business & Economic Statistics.
3. Acquire the basic statistical concepts necessary to understand and improve the quality of quantitative decisions made in business related examples.
授業方法:
The course will be in "Online Format: Simultaneous and Two-way". This course will use ZOOM and LUNA. Refer to LUNA for detailed announcements (including last minute notices) before each class.
This course will be delivered by lecture.

第2回: Overview of Statistics & Data Collection (Read Chapter 1, 2)
第3回: Describing Data Visually & Descriptive Statistics (Read Chapter 3)
第8回: Hypothesis Tests (Read Chapter 9, additional reading Chapter 10) Homework #2
第10回: Linear Regressions (Read Chapter 14,15 additional reading Chapter 16) Homework #3
第12回: Review on assignments #2, Final report assignment
